name: The Westin Hyderabad Mindspace

reviews.text: I was part of a group of folks that had meetings in Hitec City and Cyberabad. The Westin is your best bet in terms of proximity to the IT complex.
reviews.title: Great Service and Excellent Location if You're Working in Cyberabad

reviews.text: The service at the Westin is excellent, from airport shuttle, to the reception desk, to the breakfast, to the laundry. Most places in India have excellent service, and the same for the Westin. Special kudos to the hostess at the Kangan restaurant in the Westin, who works hard to make the guests feel comfortable.
reviews.title: Respite for the western traveler

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The facility itself is very good. The rooms conform to the Westin model, where you have a master console next to your bed to manage all your lights. The rooms are well sized, and the furnishings excellent. The bathrooms are very good. A bonus is the pool and the greenery, which is somewhat rare in Hyderbad.
reviews.title: Very comfortable and luxurious, has everything one needs
Convenient and safe
reviews.text: The laundry service is professional and very comendable. Pack less and count on them to turn around your clothes. If there are any clarifications needed, they will email you for additional instructions.

The best part of the Westin is that it one great and one very good restaurants. The Kangan is awesome Indian, an Chef Rakesh Anand does amazing work. Prego is an Italian restaurant, and you might need a little variety if you are there more than a week.
reviews.title: Awesome staff

reviews.text: I spent 6 weeks at the hotel for work.
reviews.title: Spoiled.

reviews.text: I was taken care of extremely well. The food is varied, and excellent. The waiters are extremely attentive, without being intrusive. They would suggest or prepare local foods for me to try. When they saw me come in for meals, they would start working on my Masala tea.
reviews.title: Great hotel - mindblowing space, cuisine, comfort and service

reviews.text: Mukesh and Purna were wonderful. The food is so good that even with making use of the onsite fitness room, I gained a kilo or two.
reviews.title: second trip and still excellent

reviews.text: I worked in the evening and the room darkening curtain was amazing. It made the room quite dark even in the middle of the day. It also helped to cut down on the outside noises (traffic horns are like conversation on the streets in India). The bed was comfortable, and the pillow selection was good (1 long, 4 regular, ranging from hard to soft). Santlal did a great job on the room, I worked through his cleaning duties without being disturbed, and still had a clean room. He was even gentle with the stuffed animal from my childhood that I brought to make a far away land feel like home. If he cleaned while I was out, I would come back to find it in different places, posed for me.
reviews.title: Very good for business

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I went on a trip to Charminar at night, and my driver escorted me about, and helped me pick a shop for bangles.
reviews.title: Comfortable stay in the heart of the IT district

reviews.text: This is a modern hotel with large, clean rooms that are well-maintained. There are a few restaurants on site, I enjoyed both the Italian and the Indian restaurants downstairs. The breakfast buffet off of the lobby was excellent. The lobby is large and comfortable. No complaints!
reviews.title: Clean, spacious, modern hotel with excellent breakfast buffet

reviews.text: Had a very satisfying stay as the room was very spacious and comfortable but more so because the health club, gym and swimming pool were amazing. And the icing was the lavish, sumptuous and mouth wateringly delicious breakfast buffet!
reviews.title: One of the best!

reviews.text: I have not had a better breakfast experience in all my travels around India and the world!
reviews.title: Still a great place to stay in Hitec City

reviews.text: The separate gyms on the upper floors are very thoughtful and convenient. Everything in the hotel was top notch though the tariff was pretty steep! I would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Wow - Unbelievable Room
Excellent stay
reviews.text: This is my 4th stay at the Westin Mindspace. Can't beat the great variety of food and great value for their lunch buffets. Love the interior room deco and furnishing.

reviews.title: Corporately Ok but could be anywhere
reviews.text: Here on business : the hotel was clean, very modern but very corporate. It could be anywhere though: rather too American. But sometimes in India its good to have a non Indian base to return too.The location is ideal if you want to be in high tech city. But with Hyderabad traffic it will be along way to most other locations. Ask for a top floor room as it is a noisy location at the lower levels. Great breakfast. Staff were corporately ok - but no more than that. All guests seem to be business types.
Very expensive limo service oddly I was told there were no taxis nearby- which I think is a ruse! Persist if you want to save money.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: This being a Westin, it has the signature Heavenly Beds, and you will get a great night's sleep. My room was also quiet, clean and restful with a very nice lighting control system. That system allows you to control the lights from the bed, and includes night lights which I found to be very nice.
reviews.title: Finest in it's class

reviews.text: The bathroom nice and the towels were plentiful. A blow dryer is included. The wifi is easy to set up and use.
reviews.title: Great 5 star hotel

reviews.text: The restaurants were all very good, and I held all my work functions like team lunches and dinners right there on site.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, good location, but check in and out was a hassle

description: A High-Tech Haven. Innovation abounds in the heart of Hyderabad’s Hitech City, also known as the new Silicon Valley of India. Our location in Raheja Mindspace IT Park allows guests easy access to major technology corporations as well as the Hyderabad International Convention Centre. Business, With A Leisure Twist. Ideal for business and leisure travelers alike, The Westin Hyderabad Mindspace inspires wellness and productivity with three pools, a Westin. WORKOUT® Gym, Heavenly spa services, an array of international restaurants and 3,600 square feet of meeting and event space. The Height of Refinement. With the exciting Hyderabad city skyline in the background, guests will enjoy complete relaxation and renewal in one of our 427 guest rooms or suites—all of which feature rich, Taipei carpets, lotus headboards, spa-like shower, and our signature Heavenly Bed®.
